summary: Blades Armor with gray cloth under-padding and golden metal.
descriptionHtml:
First ever texture mod, the leather/cloth under-padding on the armor is now gray and the metal parts are of a golden color but some steel parts remain. This can be used along with my Gray Blades Katana Hilt and Sheath and Gray Blades Shield retexture.

Gray Blades Katana Hilt and Sheath: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1499

Gray Blades Shield: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1502
author: Jayhant
